text_block_list.text:
Trainer selection test. The conditions for 
clearing the test vary. After a certain period 
of time, a test is held. one day―

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Dine elegantly…… the one over there, don't clink 
your dishes. Also hold your glass a little lower.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Eh, ah…… umm… like this? 
Ah it clink! How can you eat without ringing the dishes?

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
The one over there again, 
That thing you mentioned earlier as an appetizer is an amuse.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Really……? I mean, what is Amuse? 
I don't know, but it's similar right!?

Without paying attention to her surrounding Daiichi Ruby 
slides her knife over the food. There is no clatter of 
dishes at all, it is like watching a silent movie.

Even the fingertips holding the glass are so 
delicate that mere water looks like white wine. 
Even the gesture of wiping the mouth is fluid.

The trainers who were shown such a figure had no 
choice but to remain silent. The movement was so 
beautiful and perfect.
Another day―

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
We will now go to the opera. We will give a better 
rating to those who choose makeup, clothing, personal 
belongings, and anything else they feel is appropriate.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
There's a line of suits I've never seen before…… 
Should I just wear the expensive ones?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
… For me, it's that dress. Moderate flashiness 
to match the performance. Remove the ribbon at 
the waist for a more relaxed look.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Yes, milady. If so, how about this 
bib necklace for your neck?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I agree. But let's change the stone. 
Please bring out the oval ones.

Unlike myself, who had no idea how to choose, 
Daiichi Ruby was really used to it.
We live in different world…… such words cross my mind.

After that, we learned all sorts of manners and knowledge 
over several days, returned to self-defense again, 
took a test, and then――

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Give up… please, no more～…

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
M-Me too… I mean, 
Do trainers really need this…!?

One by one, the number of dropouts increased. 
The more they advance, the more trainers 
withdraw before they fail the test.

All this time I've watched Daiichi Ruby behavior. 
That's why I understand. The example they set, 
the beauty of their behavior.
The meaning of greatness when standing next to her.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: No, but still…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Tomorrow is the ballroom dance test. 
How are you doing?

Daiichi Ruby doesn't seem to care about our conversation 
and tells us indifferently. I don't feel the same passion 
like when she was running.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaa!!

I entered the trainer selection test with the hope that 
I might be able to get a chance. However, reality showed 
me that I'm still far from Daiichi Ruby.

A flower on a high cliff, never touched by anyone. 
It's easy to give up if you never look at her.

…But Daiichi Ruby showed me that brilliant run. 
Her figure that will never leave my mind is 
burned into my eyes.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Those of you who remain… will move on to the 
next test. Is it fine if I assume so?

As a trainer, I want to watch closely. 
I want to help her reach even greater heights. 
That's what I thought.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I understand……

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Please don't forget to check the music 
and other information for the exam. 
……Well then, have a nice day.

I watched Daiichi Ruby leave without 
giving a word of encouragement and 
ran alone to the gymnasium.

And silently repeat the ballroom dance lesson, 
for tomorrow's exam. But…

Obviously, it is not something that can be done 
overnight. I will just do what I can do now.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……You are you still here?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Everyone else has already gone home. 
You too should rest soon.

The ballroom dance test is tomorrow. I don't 
care what I do anymore. I'm going to do what I have to do.
choice_data_list: Can you teach me ballroom dancing!?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
choice_data_list: Um, I can't do it well alone――

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Your posture is bad.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Please correct your posture. You cannot get the 
correct posture while watching the video.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
You have probably memorized all the moves by now. 
Then, let's begin.

Daiichi Ruby gives me snappy instruction. 
I do as I am told and move my body to the music.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
…Lift your face. If you're going to do 
something, always do it with dignity.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Do you have anything to be ashamed of? If not, 
you should be the best you can be, stand tall, 
and look straight ahead.

Upon hearing that, I recall her demeanor 
throughout the day today. That dignified demeanor.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Yes, don't forget that form. If you have something 
to aspire to, then behave accordingly.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
That is what will eventually transforms you into 
who you aspire to be.

After that, when the decorators arrived the 
lessons continued to be moved outside.

――And the next day. Thanks to Daiichi Ruby's 
strict guidance, the test went smoothly and the 
results were satisfactory.
